channel.title: Server Development on Mac
channel.description:
Hey guys, so I just started out with the Divine Pk source from the sticky, to just basically learn stuff. I've been going through the Readme & Beginners help.txt and I've run into one specific problem, trying to load up the localhost. Even if I resolve this problem, I feel like I'm still going to have a very hard time trying to figure out what else to do later on since I have to figure out how to do each step on the Mac. Basically I wanted to know if there was some type of guide out there that covers how to do this stuff with a Mac, or perhaps someone who has done this with a Mac who is willing to be a sort of mentor for me through this process.
Thanks in advance guys, Aaron

item.title: Server Development on Mac
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 05, 2008, 03:48:32 pm[/size][hr]I dev on Mac!

Download JDK for Mac http://www.apple.com/support/downloads/javaformacosx105update1.html

Read full topic

You may also run a virtual machine with Windows XP inside to allow you to still have a windows development environment if you prefer.
